title: Story Chapter Writer
description: Generate compelling chapters for novels and stories
author: Prompt Forge

fields.label: Setting
fields.placeholder: e.g., A space station orbiting Mars in 2157

fields.label: Time Period
fields.placeholder: e.g., Far future, Medieval times, Present day

fields.label: Chapter Number/Title
fields.placeholder: e.g., Chapter 7: The Discovery

fields.label: Main Characters
fields.placeholder: e.g., Elena (protagonist, scientist), Marcus (antagonist, corporation executive)
fields.helpText: List key characters appearing in this chapter

fields.label: POV Character
fields.placeholder: e.g., Elena
fields.helpText: Whose perspective is the chapter told from?

fields.label: Chapter Purpose
fields.placeholder: e.g., Elena discovers the conspiracy, sets up the final confrontation
fields.helpText: What should this chapter accomplish in the overall story?

fields.label: Key Events
fields.placeholder: e.g., Elena finds hidden documents, Marcus threatens her team, escape sequence

fields.label: Conflict/Tension
fields.placeholder: e.g., Time pressure, moral dilemma, physical danger

fields.label: Character Development
fields.placeholder: e.g., Elena overcomes her fear of confrontation, Marcus shows vulnerability
fields.helpText: How should characters grow or change in this chapter?

fields.label: World Building Elements
fields.placeholder: e.g., Describe the corporation's technology, show space station daily life
fields.helpText: What aspects of your world should be explored?

fields.label: Previous Chapter Summary
fields.placeholder: Brief summary of what happened before...

fields.label: Foreshadowing/Setup
fields.placeholder: e.g., Hint at Elena's hidden past, setup the final battle location
fields.helpText: Elements to set up for future chapters

title: Professional Blog Post Generator
description: Create engaging blog posts for professional and business audiences
author: Prompt Forge

fields.label: Blog Post Title
fields.placeholder: e.g., 10 Tips for Effective Remote Work

fields.label: Target Audience
fields.placeholder: e.g., Remote workers, startup founders, marketing professionals

fields.label: Industry/Niche
fields.placeholder: e.g., Technology, Marketing, Healthcare, Finance

fields.label: Main Points to Cover
fields.placeholder: e.g., Setting up workspace, communication tools, time management, work-life balance
fields.helpText: List the key points or sections your post should cover

fields.label: Key Takeaways
fields.placeholder: e.g., Readers should learn specific strategies to improve productivity while working remotely
fields.helpText: What should readers gain from this post?

fields.label: Primary Keywords
fields.placeholder: e.g., remote work, productivity, work from home

fields.label: Call-to-Action
fields.placeholder: e.g., Download our free remote work toolkit, Schedule a consultation
fields.helpText: What action should readers take after reading?

fields.label: Examples/Case Studies
fields.placeholder: e.g., Success story from Company X, Personal experience with Tool Y

fields.label: Data/Statistics
fields.placeholder: e.g., 70% of companies now offer remote work, Studies show 20% productivity increase
fields.helpText: Relevant statistics or data to include

fields.label: Expert Quotes/Opinions
fields.placeholder: e.g., Quote from productivity expert, Industry leader's perspective
fields.helpText: Expert opinions to reference or quote

fields.label: Personal Experience/Angle
fields.placeholder: e.g., My 5 years of remote work experience, Lessons from managing a remote team
fields.helpText: Personal perspective or experience to include

fields.label: Visual Content Ideas
fields.placeholder: e.g., Infographic of productivity tips, Screenshot of recommended tools
fields.helpText: Suggestions for images, charts, or visual elements
